name: [ in paradisum ]
description:
~ in paradise ~
.
.
"your voice echoes in the air,
running through my mind, leaving a gentle kiss,
your succulent warmth wraps my inner soul,
blooming with iridescent melodies, leaving a sublime mark...

I lean into the unbearable bliss,
watching myself in the mirror,
tears are flowing... happy tears,
as I can hold you once again...
and together we leap into paradise..."
--230222
.
.
Graphite and colored pencils on paper.
2400 x 2400 pixel.
.
.
.
Note:
Happy times, of course it happened in my life too. I cherish them, dear to me.
Like people said, there will be a rainbow after the rain, and it's true.
Sometimes we take it for granted, but sometimes we appreciate it.
Remember your blessings, because memories are also treasure.
.
.
